![Council Member](http://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/upload/page/0053/images/Tamikia.jpg)Council Member Tamikia Jackson

Tamikia Jackson has been an active community member of Groesbeck for over 40 years.  She is a 1994 Honor Graduate of Groesbeck High School.  She holds a Bachelor of Social Work Degree from University of Texas of Arlington and a Social Work Master Degree from Texas State University. She is employed as a Program Director for Child Protective Services and has been an employee there for over 18 yrs.  She attends Lone Start Baptist Church in Groesbeck.  
  
She is the parent of one daughter, Jaleanna Jackson.  They have made their home in Groesbeck for several years and believes this is a great place to live and serve as a representative of this great city.

![Dawley](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/upload/page/0053/images/Warren%20Anglin.jpg)

Mayor Pro Tem Warren Anglin

Councilman Warren Anglin is active community member for more than 40 plus years. He is a graduate of Groesbeck High Class 1993. He holds an Associate Degree from McLennan Community College and Food Protection Manger Certification from University of North Dakota. He is employed at Mexia State Supported Living Center for 28 years and is current Food Service Director. He is a member of the Lone Star Baptist Church in Groesbeck, TX.

![Harris](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/upload/page/0053/images/Harris.jpg)

Deputy Mayor Pro Tem Kim Harris

![placeholder](https://www.cityofgroesbeck.com/upload/shared/widgets/image/000030/Image%20Placeholder%20-%20Man.png)
